title: Statement by the Press Secretary on Bilateral Meeting with President Xi Jinping of the People’s Republic of China | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
March 24, 2016

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on Bilateral Meeting with President Xi Jinping of the People’s Republic of China





	President Obama will host President Xi Jinping of the People’s Republic of China for a bilateral meeting on the margins of the Nuclear Security Summit on March 31, 2016. This bilateral meeting will present an opportunity to advance U.S.-China cooperation on a range of issues of mutual interest, while also enabling President Obama and President Xi to address areas of disagreement constructively.
